reqs: In 2017W, MDVL 310C is titled The Medieval Imagination, and will examine the role of the imagination in the literary cultures of Western Europe during the High and Late Middle ages.
courseName: Topics in Medieval Studies - TPCS MDVL STUDI
description: Interdisciplinary approaches to selected topics in medieval history, literature, and the arts; topics vary from year to year; interested students should consult the Medieval Studies advisor.
